name: 50 Years
description: 50Year's is the strategy game that you protect clan and nations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Core i5-3470T Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / ATI Radeon HD 5770 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 10 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compliant Sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Core i7-4770T Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M / ATI Radeon HD 8600 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compliant Sound card
